title: The generous enemies, or, The ridiculous lovers a comedy : as it is acted at the Theatre Royal by His Maiesties servants / by John Corye, Gent.
author: Corye, John.
publisher: Printed by H. Lloyd for James Magnus ...,
notes: Borrows chiefly from Quinault's La généreuse ingratitude, and Corneille's D. Bertran de Cigarral.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
